method.name: getReportsDir
method.description: The directory where reports will be generated.

method.name: getSourceSets
method.description: The source sets to be analyzed as part of the <tt>check</tt> and <tt>build</tt> tasks.

method.name: getToolVersion
method.description: The version of the code quality tool to be used.

method.name: isIgnoreFailures
method.description:
Whether or not to allow the build to continue if there are warnings.
Example: ignoreFailures = true

property.name: ignoreFailures
property.description:
Whether or not to allow the build to continue if there are warnings.
Example: ignoreFailures = true

property.name: reportsDir
property.description: The directory where reports will be generated.

property.name: sourceSets
property.description: The source sets to be analyzed as part of the <tt>check</tt> and <tt>build</tt> tasks.

property.name: toolVersion
property.description: The version of the code quality tool to be used.
